?? Which Alcoholic Drink Are You ??
brought to you by Quizilla ehhh....these are just a few stupid quizzes ive taken during my alotted hour of tv today...(my mom found out about the prom-oh how much i risked for so little!- and im on extreme probation). its just all too much. a week ago this moment i was getting off that accursed continental plane, stepping back into the horror and humidity i have come to know as my life. if i could back a week ago this moment i would have run home immediately and burned that accursed dress, not even waiting to sell it (well, maybe to sell it, i probably would have goteen a good price on it....). but once again i can see the light at the end of the tunnel, maybe in time for isa's quince. its really not that bad tho....im having my dad send me a bunch of books from the states (because even thats not against the rules...) and ive got no pressing issues on my agenda to be filled. that is, to say, that ive done anything ive planned on (well, almost everything, right mary?) and the rest can wait for a little while. in fact, its best that it does. i know i really havent had the oppurtunity to tell everyone about my trip to mexico, but now that i think about it, and without going into great detail, theres really not that much to say. the highlights were: 1.ali getting detained by the airport officials (that was fucking hilarious tho) 2.my committee (and everything related) 3.the assemblies....(no comment) 4.my host! (she was the best right ana? :-P) 5.the people i went with (i couldnt have picked a better travel group, and enrique can liven up any picture!) thats about it. i could go into everything, like how derek got his gender confused and had to declare his obleas :-P but i dont think anyone cares that much. eh id write more but there really isnt that much to say, and the whole concept of typing quietly (to elude my mother as the use of my computer is expressly forbidden) has eluded me, so i shall be off before i am caught, again. muahs much. P.S. o and by the way, my icon refers to someone new. and TOTALLY deserving ;-)

You Are Right Brained In Love

Bit of a drama queen
Peacemaker, first to end a fight
Good at thinking up creative dates
Tend to fall in love and get hurt easily
Going with your gut instead of your head
Emphathetic and caring, sometimes to a fault
Good at recognizing patterns in relationships
Been in love many times, perhaps too many to count
Wildly passionate and intense when falling in love
Spontaneous with relationships, going with the flow
Overly visual - can play back past dates like movies in your mind
Roses, love poems, and stuffed animals are a good start to winning your heart

Are You Right Brained or Left Brained in Love? Take This Quiz :-)

Find the Love of Your Life (and More Love Quizzes) at Your New Romance.
prom last night. disappointingly, well, disappointing. reminded me just how MUCH i HATE my ex, who annoys the hell out of me while trying to get "some" :-P right like THAT would EVER happen again! jaja......left early cuz i was depressed and my feet hurt like a bitch so i had him take me in a taxi over to marys house to get my backpack with all my shit in it. these were the two options he gave me: keep partying till 6.30 (it was 2) until i had to go to school have him drop me off at a motel or something to sleep ^^me: "what? ill have to think about that last option there." him: "well i wouldnt stay and if you wanted me too, id be perfectly gentlemanly." right. so my options were to subject my feet to another 4 1/2 hours of torture, or be raped by some cheap motel owners(cuz i wasnt goint to intercontinental on $15). or i could be raped by my "gentlemanly" (horny) ex. some options. so i told him to take me to marys house to get my stuff and by this time im about to fucking just burst out crying. i go up to her floor and my shit is sitting outside. now i had told marys mom i was at angelas, so there would be no excuse to be there, but god i just needed to talk to maree soooo badly. fello was still waiting in the taxi, cuz i told him i would be back out again. me: "hello? listen im gonna stay here ok?" him: "ok" it was probably the best conversation id ever had with him. so i go in the stairwell, make the call, and out she comes. she loves me so much, and within 5 minutes im in her room changing for bed. we talked for a while, and hugged, which i really needed, and then i got about 4 hours of sleep, which i needed even more. i woke up, got ready, and went to school on marys bus. and after that everything was normal, except that mary left. *tear* i miss her a lot already. pipo and i are already having severe withdrawal symptoms, and it hasnt even been 8 hours. i leave for ny tomorrow. hopefully this will be the distraction i so desperately need. hopefully yours, vivis

F:

Your Beauty lies in Contradiction. Controversial, unpredictable, and
never what anyone expects. You appearance and your personality are two
opposite things. Even your appearance sends different signals to different
people. To some you may look innocent and sweet, to others you look mysterious
and intimidating at the same time. No one ever knows what to expect with you.
You are a little bit of everything all mixed together. You can be watching
the football game with the guys one minute and the next out shopping at the
mall. You seem to be almost a different person every time you meet someone, but
at the same time you know exactly who you are and there is always that one
thing that makes you you. You enjoy keeping people guessing and people love how
completely unpredictable you are.

Some Things That Represent You:

Element: Fire, Water Animal: Chameleon Color:
Dark Tones, Light Tones Song: Everything by Alanis Morriesette
Expression: Half-smile

Gemstone: Opal Mythological Creature: Gryphon,
Half-breeds Planet: Mars Hair
Color: Red Eye Color: Brown

Quote: "Appearances can be deceiving."



Where Does Your Beauty Lie? ..::Original Pictures Are Back! Detailed Results::..

What Does Your Name Mean?
Your Dominant Intelligence is Linguistic Intelligence
You are excellent with words and language. You explain yourself well. An elegant speaker, you can converse well with anyone on the fly. You are also good at remembering information and convicing someone of your point of view. A master of creative phrasing and unique words, you enjoy expanding your vocabulary. You would make a fantastic poet, journalist, writer, teacher, lawyer, politician, or translator.
What Kind of Intelligence Do You Have?
hey yalls....i dont really have the time or patience to update a lot...or anything to update on....but i thought id just drop a line really quick proms a few days away and im so excited...no....its NOT just another excuse to go shopping! leaving for NY <<♥ on saturday....gotta get a lot of extra time in with pipo and mareeeeeeeeee before i leave for practically forever no jaja jk thats about it muahs. *"*love and other indoor sports*"* vivis

whoa. christ how long has it been since ive fucking updated???? :-S ... wow before panamun...(more than a month, and by far one of the most eventful *so far*). i picked out my prom dress yesterday......its so fucking beautiful and thank you piBo jaja :-P for coming with me i had a *sexylicious* day....muahs! i need to call fello tho....party on friday to raise money but i think i can get in for free jaja ;-) and i got to have something fun to do while everyone else is working their asses off studying for gayass easy semestrals...life has been a ton easier lately. mary got over that bet sin tav resh dalet(ask me what this stands for in english*its hebrew by the way**kinda*) and shes got something good coming something good i can tell ;-) luv ya lots babe....partied last friday.....made an ass out of myself jumping over pipo and doing my drunken ballet jaja it was so hotnsexi :-P christ its fucking 10, i have a geometry project thats 5% of my grade due tomorrow i havent even looked at, and my rooms a mess and the workers will be coming in all day tomorrow to work haha i have some really good priorities... it was a really fucked up month for romance tho....i succeeded at and allowed everything i wanted...but it wasnt as great as i imagined....i hurt a few ppl along the way, mostly including myself, and gave myself a few more shameful moments to look back upon in later years :-P i just wanna start over and ive already got a little something something lined up for my extended absence in new york *que romantic!* haha who would have ever labeled moi as a planner? :-P if you wanna know more, i got plenty of stories *especially for all those of you who i might have been excluding in cali...sorry babes!* but i jsut dont feel like creating more drama by posting my *entire* life on the web ;-) really fucked up month for friendships too. i had a couple of falling outs with some*one* while at the same time meeting some of the most awesome ppl ever (GOTTA LOVE YOU PIPO!!! YOU ROCK MY SOCKS FOREVER BABAY!) jaja you too dan NANNY FOREVER no jk hahahaha. got the thrill and disappointments of my life when i subsequently found out mary was staying all four years, then learning that the embassy changed it back to two... :-S i know itll all get better tho, if dalet resh dalet taught me anything its that its easier to get over even crazy shit with the help of a few close ppl. te amo. seriously, te amo. im prob gonna start updating more consistently now....i guess i was jsut too busy and had too much to say before when everybody was pressuring me to....now that a lot of things are out of the way i can clear my head and get back to whats important, like CSI--whoops gotta run! you know you ♥ me, vivis

AUGUST: Loves to joke. Attractive. Suave and caring. Brave
and fearless. Firm and has leadership qualities. Knows how to
console others. Too generous and egoistic. Takes high pride of oneself. Thirsty
for praises. Extraordinary spirit. Easily angered. Angry when
provoked. Easily jealous. Observant. Careful and cautious. Thinks quickly.
Independent thoughts. Loves to lead and to be led. Loves to dream. Talented in
the arts, music and defense. Sensitive but not petty. Poor resistance
against illnesses. Learns to relax. Hasty and trusty. Romantic. Loving and
caring. Loves to make friends .

brought to you by Quizilla comment if you think this is me!!!! lol positively swamped w/ panamun and such...i promise to make a big entry on thursday or friday much love vivis

SEXUAL PREFERENCE: you SEXUAL PREFERENCE EVERYONE ELSE THINKS YOU HAVE: lEsBiAn.... :P haha ya anyways super bored because my dad was stupid and made me come home early for no reason and everyone else is at school right now watching the game...... I LOST MY WATCH. I WANT TO DIE.
You are purple. What a romantic person you are.
You're sentimental and forward-looking (those
are opposites.). You're a sophisticated and
refined--with a refind taste for chocolates and
wine (yum...). Tempermental and moody, you let
people know when you're angry. But other
times, you just sit and sulk. Alone. When
around people, you're a generous person, with
insatiable needs. You're a starving artist,
basically. You're enjoy getting into debates
over politics and religion with people of the
same intelligence of you. But you know they
can never convince you otherwise, you stubborn
person, you. As a unique person you are (not
to mention just a tad bit eccentric...), you're
well-liked by either a few people, or too many
people...
The Creator

it was so hilarious like at the beginning of class, ali y. was looking through marys bag and she had her toothbrush and he was like "omg its a vibrator!" and then we were all laughing and he started going through and making sexual comments about all her other stuff lol...adn then she showed him her toothpaste adn she was all "here smell it it smells good" so when he bent down to smell out she like squeezed a bunch up his nose and we were both laughing so hard we were crying. then like mr patrick started to talk about this stump saying that they are really big and everything and then ali was like "ya like mine" and mr patrick started laughing sooooo hard he was crying and it was hilarious and now he cant use that word anymore! and ya now im in the comp lab cuz im excused from the test and all....yearbook was fun today. the first part we went and delivered juice and it was very SHITTY. like after we came back we had all these leftover cups of iced tea so we decided to have some and it tasted soooo bad....it turns out we had been giving the kids sugar water! like really really sugary too... :S then in yearbook after we came back (cuz it only took like 30 minutes) she made us go to the library and we were talking about feet ( LOL MARY AND ANGELA) and then like this guy with a world record.... (he cant wear shorts! lolz...) then we had a very shitty lunch and now im here. so ya. everybody is at the crepes and waffles dealie so im bored and hungry

but i am going to the movie tonite.
fun shit

I WANT IT ALL THE WAY IN!!!! LOLZ...

aviva

today like....sucked. we were playing (american) football in pe and then mary kinda inadvertantly tackled me and i ended up fracturing my wrist. go figure. we were at er for like 3 hours and it was awful and like there was this obese lady and she was crying and it was kinda *scary*. it sucks. i barely fractured it, but it hurts like a motherfucker and i have to wear a freaking CAST for 2 weeks. i cant 1. straighten my hair, 2. pour drinks, 3. carry things, 4. TYPE (and when i do it hurts so ya), 5. wash my hair (haha dont worry my mom is going to help me wash it in the sink or something...) and there will be a ton more when i find out i cant do them EITHER. it really sucks, but i dont have to do ANY pe for 2 weeks. and i got to miss spanish and geometry *again* today. well whatever

ha....TODAY SUCKED. except i got to skip geometry and all, but i didnt even miss anything worthwhile, like a test or notes or some shit like that. anyways ya panamun is going to like suck ass tomorrow i do NOT want to read my goddamn opening speech.....mary said i looked like a bitch after volleyball, i swear to god i had no idea honestly you have to tell me when i look really pissed because i swear to god i wasnt and ya i just think everyone really cares about this so moving right along....we actually started learning in spanish today go figure. and then enrique dropped a rotten orange on my lap. FUN SHIT. screw this
<marquee> haha "all natural" lemonade....*dont ask*<marquee/>
aviva

hey yall

well this weekend sucked. gddamn today kinda sucked. people come up to me and talk about shit that they actually have no idea about, and i cant tell them to stop because unless they understand (which i cant explain to anyone except mary) well they wont stop! gddamn but hey i can get through this. I CANT BELIEVE I FELT BAD THIS MORNING MARY! im such an idiot! >:( i cant believe i almost fell for that act.... i feel awful, but only because of thinking how close i came to being used again. NEVER AGAIN. there were so many signs; the lack of communication, the enormous feeling of distance between us, his continual avoidance of me (shy and nervous my ass!) it would be bad enough just as it is, but my last relationship consisted of this one guy (who i really liked) who "used" me then abandoned me for my friend who gave him a handjob. and he (d) knew this. BEFORE we did anything too! and im angry at myself too, if not just as much. i should have learned my lesson about this sort of "relationship" from before, and not trusted ANYONE to make the right choice! and maybe i should have waited until later in the year (because i did want something anyhow, not just as a result of what happened), and maybe i should have waited for him, because i knew he was still "confused" about his last relationship. its the truth. guys think with their dicks, but girls think with their hearts. and only guys leave "satisfied."

you remind me of everything i can never be
and yet im
joyful
knowing that i will have a 
lost world 
with me as long as 
you 
are in my heart.

you can never forget some things,
and this is best because the worst things in life make the best memories worth having

the only pure form of love is that which is sheltered from the public eye

the only way to get rid of a temptation is to yield to it

theres no sin....except stupidity

one should always play fairly...when one has winning cards

the power of acute observation is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it

the trouble with her is that she lacks the power of conversation but not the power of speech

i want money in order to buy the time to get the things that money cannot buy

i think i am. therefore i am...i think

remember: dishonesty is the second best policy

if god really made everything, id say he has a quality control problem

i wonder why prostitution is illegal. why should it be illegal to sell something thats perfectly legal to give away?

nothing you write, if you hope it to be any good, will ever come out as you first hoped

cynicsim is an unpleasant way of saying the truth

people change...and forget to tell eachother

death is just nature's way of telling you "hey, youre not alive any more"

god forbid anything should be easy

love is blind, but desire jsut doesnt give a good goddamn

humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility

sixty minutes of thinking of any kind is bound to lead to confusion and unhappiness

under certain circumstances, profanity provides a relief denied even to prayer

los angeles's full name is el pueblo de nuestra senora la reina de los angeles de prociuncula

never regret anything that once made you smile

i would, in fact id even have seconds and wash it down with a cool frosty one!.....would u rather get mad cow disease or be the top scientist in your field?...the thinker, and the stinker......WINK!.....i got an A, 2 Bs and a C!....we're going to the dolce gabbana show, how fast can u have your bags packed?.....suck it trebek....ape tit!..... a one, or a two, or a three, or maybe even a four....thats the way your mother likes it! ok well ya that was fun anyways nm im frustrated also and most ppl know why but because this is public and some people will most likely be reading it very often, i will keep at least one thing in my life sacred from the public eye. that is until you know tomorrow when everyones had the chance to talk to everyone else about everyone else if you can follow that. hey people you know what? Ugh they are absolute fags!!! Also, i cant go to coronado which absolutely sucks ass because that was going to be the best weekend of our entire high school years honestly! on a slightly less traumatic side note, ive completely lost my parents trust, but hey, it was bound to happen anyway. OMG THOSE WHORES THEY TOOK AWAY THE 700 DOLLARS IN MY ACCOUNT!!! i hate them soo much! now i cant go shopping or go out to dinner because they are not going to even LEND me money. they are such fags they are making me work for it, for as much as my maid gets an hour! its an absolute outrage. when im a famous writer in the dedication im going to mention how all my inspiration came from pure hate, rage, and pain. then im going to thank my parents for inspiring me to write. gd they are so stupid. my mom kept coming into my room and saying (vainly in an effort to cheer me up,) that "sofia/mary is 'meurta' too" what the fuck is that supposed to mean?!?!?! she is such a stupid bitch sometimes i wonder what she drugged my dad with to get him to marry her. honestly. and like thinking that i had sold my friends out was going to make me feel better???
